actions.name: create-country-targeting-rule
actions.description: Set geographic targeting rules for a link with specific destination per country.

actions.name: create-short-link
actions.description: Create a new short link with optional parameters (title, UTM tags, expiration, cloaking, etc.)

actions.name: delete-short-link
actions.description: Permanently delete a short link by its unique link ID.

actions.name: get-domain-statistics
actions.description: Retrieve usage stats (clicks, conversions) for a domain within a time period.

actions.name: expire-short-link
actions.description: Set an expiration date or click limit to deactivate a short link.

actions.name: get-short-link-info-by-path
actions.description: Retrieve detailed information about a short link using its domain and path.

actions.name: get-link-clicks
actions.description: Retrieve click statistics for specific short links by their IDs.

actions.name: list-short-links
actions.description: Retrieve all links on a domain, with pagination and date-range filters.

actions.name: update-short-link
actions.description: The HTTP status code for the redirect. The default is 302 (Found).

triggers.name: new_link_created
triggers.description: Fires when a new short link is created on a domain. Useful to sync newly created links to other systems.
